Invocation Name: veda mantra
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sai Ram. Auspicious and Powerful Vedic Chants reverberating to create a positive atmosphere to eliminate stress, fear, anxiety and depression. Tune in to Sri Sathya Sai Media Centre's Vedic Chants Radio Station for various Vedic Hyms and Suktams. The skill plays content (vedic chants) in Sanskrit Language.

Disclaimer : The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number

Following are the vedic chants, the divine mantras, that play 24/7 uninterrupted in Vedic Chants Internet Radio : Ganapathi Prardhana, Rudram - Namakam and Chamakam, Purusha Suktam, Sikhshavali, Bramhanandavali, Bhriguvali, Mahanarayanopanishad, Arunam, Ganapathi Atharvasheersham, Ganapathi Suktam, Suryopanishad, Narayanopanishad, Suryanamaskaram, Navagraha Suktam, Sri Suktam, Nasadeeya Suktam, Bhu Suktam, Pavamana Suktam, Devi Suktam, Durga Suktam, Neela Suktam, Atma Suktam, Narayana Suktam, Medha Suktam, Vishnu Suktam, Ayushya Suktam, Bhagya Suktam, Samaana Suktam, Durva Suktam, Hiranyagarbha Suktam, Prokshana Mantram, Shivopasana Mantram, Mantra Pushpam, Ishavasyopanishad, Laghunyasam, Namah Somaya Ghanapatha, Namah Bhavaya Ghanapatha, Ganesha Prardhana Ghanapatha, Saraswati Prardhana Ghanapatha, Gayathri Mantra Ghanapatha, Medha Ghanapatha, Karoti Ghanapatha, Sarvadevatha Gayathri, Ekadasha Rudram, Sai Gayatri, Udakashanti Mantra, Svasti Vaachaka Sloka, Kshama Prarthana, Swasti Prajabya Paripalayamtam, Kara Charana Krutam Vaak, SARVADHARMA PRAYER, Asatoma Sad Gamaya, Brahmarpanam

To access the skill please follow the following steps
a) Enable Alexa Skill : There are three ways of activating Alexa Skills. One through Alexa App, Activating Alexa Skills Via Voice Commands and Activating Alexa Skills Via the Amazon Site
b) After Enabling the Skill, You will be able to play discourses

1) Activating Alexa Skills Via the App
Open up the app and tap on More at the bottom right, then tap on Skills & Games.
Search for the Skill and Enable.

2) Activating Alexa Skills Via Voice Commands
Say """"Alexa, Enable Veda Mantra""""

3) Activating Alexa Skills Via the Amazon Site
Search for the Skill on Alexa Skills Page on Amazon https://www.amazon.com/alexa-skills/b?ie=UTF8&node=13727921011
Enable through the Alexa Skills Page"""
